mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, writer, regdate, updateDate FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, bno, title, writer, regdate, updateDate FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, bno, title, writer, regdate, updateDate FROM ( SELECT bno, title, writer, regdate, updateDate FROM tbl_board ORDER BY bno DESC ) ) WHERE rn >= (#{pageNum} - 1) * 10 + 1 ) WHERE rownum <= #{amount}
mapper.insert:
select seq_board.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_board(bno, title, content, writer) values (#{bno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updateDate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
